title: Pizza Delivery Sivir Missing Bouncing Blade Particles (?)
body:
Hey

So I've been playing a bit of Sivir lately and noticed on her Pizza Delivery skin the "active" particle for her W is the [same as her default skin](https://i.imgur.com/IFkiqIg.png)

I would imagine that there should be a unique particle for this skin, since all of her other 1350s have one (including victorious, to my testing).

I know this skin was released nearly a year ago and there was never really a particle there to begin with (according to the Skin Spotlights videos, anyways) but is there any chance for this skin to get some love? It looks totally out of place, especially for an epic tier skin.

I also know this isn't necessarily a bug but I'm not sure where else to post this.

replies.body:
Hi! 

You're correct that she isn't intended to have custom (W) particles, looking at both her spotlights and our testing documentation. At this time, we don't have bandwidth to go back and modify this skin (and to be honest, most skins, unless we're talking bugs -- particularly those affecting gameplay. ;-;).
